title: Fresh Cops
overview: Nearly 10,000 new recruits joined the police in the last year, Fresh Cops follows some of the youngest as they begin their cop careers.With exclusive access to Leicestershire police, the series will ride shotgun with some of the force's youngest officers as they learn the ropes on the frontline of crime. The series is filmed from their perspective, takes viewers into the heart of the action and will reveal the young people behind the uniforms.
